item.title: Bitcoin Improvement Proposal: Hard Fork to Return Seized Silk Road Bitcoin to Ross Ulbricht
item.description:
Bitcoin Improvement Proposal: Hard Fork to Return Seized Silk Road Bitcoin to Ross Ulbricht

Title: Hard Fork to Return Seized Silk Road Bitcoin to Ross Ulbricht Author: Satoshi Nakamoto Status: Draft Type: Standards Track Created: 2016-07-20 On October 1, 2013, an attacker exploited Ross Ulbricht's Bitcoin wallet and drained 29,655 BTC from Ulbricht's accounts. Later, the attacker drained an additional 144,336 BTC from the wallet, stealing a total of 173,991 BTC.

item.title: Improving Transaction Monitoring With Machine Learning And Blockchain
item.description:
Improving Transaction Monitoring With Machine Learning And Blockchain

Ensuring the accuracy of data, as well as streamlining downstream reporting for transaction monitoring, can benefit from machine learning. Most people see blockchain technology as a way to reduce costs in the financial ecosystem. While it is certainly true Bitcoin technology can help institutions save a lot of money, there are other technologies which can be beneficial as well.

item.title: Coinbase Wallet Users Can Now Buy and Sell Ether - CoinDesk
item.description:
Coinbase Wallet Users Can Now Buy and Sell Ether - CoinDesk

Digital asset exchange provider Coinbase has added support for ether, the digital currency that powers the ethereum blockchain. The announcement comes just two months after the startup, which has raised $117m to date, added ether trading to its bitcoin exchange service, at which time it also formally rebranded the platform, Global Digital Asset Exchange ( GDAX).

item.title: New DAPP Platform Rise Aims At Being Most User-Friendly
item.description:
New DAPP Platform Rise Aims At Being Most User-Friendly

Rise, a decentralized application and investment platform, has closed its ICO campaign on June 24, and is now on the road to becoming one of the most secure and user-friendly DAPP platforms out there. The success of Ethereum as the largest Blockchain-as-a-Service platform so far have lead to the appearance of many similar projects.

item.title: Blockchain in finance and management fields. Fintech and govtech cases at Blockchain Conference Kiev - Bitcoin News
item.description:

item.title: Halving Aftermath Points To Rosy Future For Price Of Bitcoin
item.description:
Halving Aftermath Points To Rosy Future For Price Of Bitcoin

So, "The Halving" came and went and, as I anticipated a couple of weeks ago, it was not exactly earth-shattering for Bitcoin. The price did drop.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Tonight's Key Levels - NEWSBTC
item.description:

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. This morning we noted that action in the bitcoin price was perfect for going at the markets with an intrarange, intraday strategy.

item.title: Coinbase Adds Ethereum
item.description:
Coinbase Adds Ethereum

Coinbase adds Ethereum just a day after a historical and highly successful hardfork. Coinbase customers in 32 countries can now easily directly buy, sell store and send eth from their Coinbase account, making a conversion from btc to eth unnecessary, saving money in conversion fees.

item.title: NetCents Payment Gateway API Commences Beta Testing
item.description:
NetCents Payment Gateway API Commences Beta Testing

VANCOUVER, B.C., July 21, 2016 - NetCents Technology Inc. ("NetCents" or the "Company") (CSE: NC) is pleased to announce the launch of its newly updated Enterprise Solutions Payment Gateway. Disclaimer: This is a press release. Bitcoinist is not responsible for this firm's products and/or services.

item.title: Mining Bitcoins Is A Surprisingly Energy-Intensive Endeavor
item.description:
Mining Bitcoins Is A Surprisingly Energy-Intensive Endeavor

Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are growing in importance and rely on supercomputers and lots of electrons for their creation. If they become a truly vital sector of the economy, they will draw substantial amounts of electricity in low-cost power markets across the globe.
